scaleSSD.utils¶

scaleSSD.utils.box_utils¶

scaleSSD.utils.box_utils.calculate_iou(box1, box2)¶

Calculates IoU between two boxes

Parameters

  • box1 (list[float, float, float, float]) – first boss in [x,y,w,h] format

  • box2 (list[float, float, float, float]) – second boss in [x,y,w,h] format

Returns

iou value

Return type

float

scaleSSD.utils.box_utils.extract_all_anchor_boxes(input_shape, fmap_sizes, anchors)¶

Extract anchor boxes on all feature map positions

Parameters

  • input_shape (tuple(int, int)) – width and height of model’s input image

  • fmap_sizes (list((int,int)..)) – list of width, height tuples of all feature maps

  • anchors (list(list((int,int)..)..)) – contains anchor size for all feature maps

Returns

all calculated anchor positions

Return type

numpy array

scaleSSD.utils.box_utils.get_anchor_boxes(input_shape, fmap_sizes, anchors, receptive_windows)¶

Get all anchor box positions for a specific receptive window

Parameters

  • input_shape (tuple(int, int)) – width and height of model’s input image

  • fmap_sizes (list((int,int)..)) – list of width, height tuples of all feature maps

  • anchors (list(list((int,int)..)..)) – contains anchor size for all feature maps

  • receptive_windows (list((int,int)..)) – list of receptive windows with dimensions relevant to the input image size. They specify where to extract anchor positions.

Returns

all calculated anchor positions

Return type

numpy array

scaleSSD.utils.io_ops.json_to_dict(json_file)¶

Loads a json to python dictionary

Parameters

json_file (str) – json file to load

Returns

dictionary of loaded json

Return type

dict

scaleSSD.utils.io_ops.save_dict(json_dict, output_file)¶

Saves dictionary to json format

Parameters

  • json_dict (dict) – dictionary to save

  • output_file (str) – file to save the outputed json

scaleSSD.utils.losses¶

class scaleSSD.utils.losses.ODLoss(minibatch_size, sampler, class_weights)¶

Bases: torch.nn.modules.module.Module

Object detection loss class. Has a cross entropy and

a regression component.

Parameters

  • bbox_lamda (float) – regression lamda factor

  • minibatch_size (int) – maximum size of the minibatch

  • cls_lamda (float) – classification lamda factor

  • sampler (str) – minibatch sampler type. Can be ‘dns’ or ‘basic’

  • class_weights (list[float...] or None) – list of weights for each category

calc_bbox_loss(reg_gts_minibatch, reg_pred_minibatch)¶

Calculates bounding box regression loss

Parameters

  • reg_gts_minibatch (torch.Tensor of shape [n_samples, 1]) – ground truth minibatch

  • reg_pred_minibatch (torch.Tensor of shape [n_samples, n_classes]) – predicted minibatch

Returns

smooth_l1 loss

Return type

torch.Tensor

calc_ce_loss(cls_gts_minibatch, cls_pred_minibatch)¶

Calculates classification cross-entropy loss

Parameters

  • cls_gts_minibatch (torch.Tensor of shape [n_samples, 1]) – ground truth minibatch

  • cls_pred_minibatch (torch.Tensor of shape [n_samples, n_classes]) – predicted minibatch

Returns

cross entropy loss

Return type

torch.Tensor

forward(preds, targets)¶

Forwards loss calculation and returns loss

Parameters

  • preds (torch.Tensor) – model predicted predictions

  • targets (torch.Tensor) – annotation targets

Returns

total loss (cross entropy + regression loss)

Return type

torch.Tensor

training: bool¶

scaleSSD.utils.minibatch_sampling¶

class scaleSSD.utils.minibatch_sampling.BaseSampler(minibatch_size=128)¶

Bases: object

Base sampler class for detection minibatch sampling

Parameters

minibatch_size (int) – total size of sampled minibatches

filter_tensors(tensors, mask)¶

Applies specified mask to each tensor in the list

Parameters

  • tensors (list[torch.Tensor...]) – list of torch tensors to apply the mask to

  • mask (bool) – mask to apply

Returns

list of filtered tensors

Return type

list[torch.Tensor…]

sample_minibatches(cls_gts, cls_pred, reg_gts, reg_pred)¶

Sample minibatches by keeping difficult positives and negatives

Parameters

  • cls_gts (torch.Tensor) – ground truth classification tensor

  • cls_pred (torch.Tensor) – predicted classification tensor

  • reg_gts (torch.Tensor) – ground truth regression tensor

  • reg_pred (torch.Tensor) – predicted regression tensor

Returns

tuple of sampled tensors

Return type

tuple(torch.Tensor, torch.Tensor, torch.Tensor, torch.Tensor)

class scaleSSD.utils.minibatch_sampling.DynamicNegativeSampler(minibatch_size=10000)¶

Bases: scaleSSD.utils.minibatch_sampling.BaseSampler

Dynamic negative sampler class for detection minibatch sampling. Keeps sampling positives and missclassified negatives

Parameters

minibatch_size (int) – total size of sampled minibatches

sample_minibatches(cls_gts, cls_pred, reg_gts, reg_pred)¶

Sample minibatches by keeping all positives and missclassified negatives

Parameters

  • cls_gts (torch.Tensor) – ground truth classification tensor

  • cls_pred (torch.Tensor) – predicted classification tensor

  • reg_gts (torch.Tensor) – ground truth regression tensor

  • reg_pred (torch.Tensor) – predicted regression tensor

Returns

tuple of sampled tensors

Return type

tuple(torch.Tensor, torch.Tensor, torch.Tensor, torch.Tensor)
